Submit Place - Vegamot
Vegamót | Vegamótstíg 4, 101 Reykjavík | 511 3040 |
Vegamót is one of Reykjavík´s best hidden secrets, situated just next to the main shopping street Laugavegur. At Vegamót, you will get quality meals at attractive prices.
There is a beer offer on weekdays and until eight o´clock during the weekend. When the sun is shining it is great to sit outside. At night time if you long for a drink and music then Vegamót is a good choice.
Typical main course price: 1.300 kr. - 2.500 kr.
Random Customer Opinion:
Date: 8/29/2007 20:17 PM Name: Adam Kleinberger Rating: Opinion: really good food and the price is not so bad. relaxed mood and again the food is exellante!! See all reviews
Place ratings Website: www.vegamot.is E-mail: vegamot@vegamot.is Website in english: Yes On-line menu: Yes Menu in english: Yes Order: Catering Service: Catering Room:
